enabled.title: Enable Plugin
enabled.description: Enable or disable the 7-segment clock plugin

display_duration.title: Display Duration
display_duration.description: How long to display the clock (seconds)

is_24_hour_format.title: 24 Hour Format
is_24_hour_format.description: Display time in 24-hour format (false for 12-hour format)

has_leading_zero.title: Leading Zero
has_leading_zero.description: Show leading zero for hours (e.g., 09:30 instead of 9:30)

has_flashing_separator.title: Flashing Separator
has_flashing_separator.description: Enable blinking separator (colon) between hours and minutes

color_daytime.title: Daytime Color
color_daytime.description: Hex color code for daytime display (e.g., #FFFFFF for white)

color_nighttime.title: Nighttime Color
color_nighttime.description: Hex color code for nighttime display (e.g., #FFFFFF for white)

min_fade_elevation.title: Fade During
min_fade_elevation.description: Sun elevation threshold for color mixing
